content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_wool
inventory=[{"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 27}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 32}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 27, "index": 37}]

thought: To craft cyan_wool, I first need to craft white_wool. To do this, I need to place 4 string items in a 2x2 square in the crafting table. I have 4 string items in slot 27, so I will move 1 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 3, "index": 27}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 32}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 27, "index": 37}]
thought: I now need to move the second string item to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 32}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 27, "index": 37}]
thought: I now need to move the third string item to slot 4, which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 32}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 27, "index": 37}]
thought: I now need to move the fourth string item to slot 5, which is to the right of slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 32}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 27, "index": 37}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the white_wool, I need to move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11) so that I can craft the cyan_wool.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "snowball", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 32}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 27, "index": 37}]
thought: To craft the cyan_wool, I need to place the white_wool and the cyan_dye in the crafting table. I will move the white_wool to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
